thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Implanet 2017 Revenue Of EUR 7.8 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Implanet 2017 Revenue Of EUR 7.8 Million
text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - IMPLANET SA:
* IMPLANET: 2017 REVENUE OF €7.8 MILLION * ‍FOURTH-QUARTER 2017 REVENUE CAME TO EUR 1.9 MILLION​ * ‍KNEE BUSINESS RECORDED A 16% DECLINE FOLLOWING PLANNED CLOSURE OF ARTHROSCOPY DISTRIBUTION​
* ‍IN FRANCE IN 2017, IMPLANET SOLD 4,101 JAZZ UNITS, GENERATING EUR 1.5 MILLION IN REVENUE (UP 16%)
* ‍IN US IN 2017, 1,537 JAZZ UNITS WERE SOLD (UP 6%) GENERATING EUR 2.0 MLN IN REVENUE​​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
